item.title: Lib: clock/xd
item.description: Sometimes you need to send a single pulse from one clock domain to another. This is a simple case of clock domain crossing or CDC. This post uses the xd module from the Project F Library to handle such situations simply and safely. This post was last updated in October 2022.
